page.title: 06CLUBS
page.content: In our area clubs include Lyndale youth club,The Octel companys playing fields, and in Raby Hall farm field, The West Cheshire riding club, The Model Aircraft club and a fishing club meet on Sundays. Many groups meet in{St Peters chapel on diffrent evenings including B.B, Anchor boys, Cubs, Brownies, Guides, Scouts and a Womens Institute. { Bromborough Golf club}is a private club with seven hundred and twenty members and twenty two staff. The club is open every day apart from Christmas day.You can start to play at eight, at sixteen you can become a full member. Most players are local but some travel long distances. You have to be a member to play at { The Octel Sports Club.}Sports like football,tenis and many more. Cubs camp there annually.
